txt.en: Chest armour, helmets, and boots that need repair are scattered around Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nYou should repair various armour pieces so that soldiers are well protected for the march east.
Angbor can be found at Aragorn's Pavilion on the after-battle Pelennor.\n\nYou should talk to Angbor.
'I thank you for your diligence in assisting the Host of the West.'
Angbor has been tasked with arming the men who will march east, but much of the armour is worn from the recent battle on Pelennor Fields.

'As expected, much of the armour used in the battle upon the Pelennor has been worn and broken. I hear you have some skill in armour repair. Would you be willing to repair armour scattered around the pavilion?'
